text: The World Ends with You, released in Japan as is an action role-playing game made by Square Enix and Jupiter for the Nintendo DS game console. == Other websites == * Official Japanese website * Official North American website * Official European website * Official DeviantArt account - Concept Art Slides * Square Enix Members Site coverage * Category:2007 video games Category:Square Enix games Category:Action role-playing video games Category:Android (operating system) games Category:IOS games Category:Japanese role-playing video games Category:Kingdom Hearts Category:Nintendo DS games Category:Nintendo Switch games Category:Video games about death games Category:World War III video games
title: The World Ends with You
